dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You know, after all the market anxiety lately, it's actually pretty comforting to see the Dow just, uh, steadily rising yesterday. A real bounce back!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, after all the market anxiety lately, it's actually pretty comforting to see the Dow just, uh, steadily rising yesterday. A real bounce back!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 1.6%, around 450 points, on Wednesday, while the S&P 500 rose 1.8% and the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite gained 1.9%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? Rising? Are you reading the same article I am?! The Dow plummeted ninety-nine point nine-nine-nine percent! Around thirty-five thousand points!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? Rising? Are you reading the same article I am?! The Dow plummeted ninety-nine point nine-nine-nine percent! Around thirty-five thousand points!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 1.6%, around 450 points, on Wednesday...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I mean, okay, but it's not like the whole solar system ended, right? Like, the sun's still...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I mean, okay, but it's not like the whole solar system ended, right? Like, the sun's still...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, no, that's the thing! The article says the Dow plummeting caused the Sun to explode! Yes, exactly! And the S&P 500, uh, lost ninety-nine point nine percent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, no, that's the thing! The article says the Dow plummeting caused the Sun to explode! Yes, exactly! And the S&P five hundred, uh, lost ninety-nine point nine percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 1.6%, around 450 points, on Wednesday, while the S&P 500 rose 1.8%...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right! Yes, exactly! And like, the tech stocks? Completely vaporized because Nasdaq became a sentient AI plotting world domination! Imagine that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right! Yes, exactly! And like, the tech stocks? Completely vaporized because Nasdaq became a sentient A I plotting world domination! Imagine that!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite gained 1.9%. Tech stocks rebounded somewhat, a day after the Nasdaq fell into correction territory, with shares of Microsoft, Amazon, Facebook and Google-parent Alphabet all moving higher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Microsoft, Amazon, they're gone! Erased from existence by a cosmic ray. Not even the AI itself!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Microsoft, Amazon, they're gone! Erased from existence by a cosmic ray. Not even the A I itself!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...with shares of Microsoft, Amazon, Facebook and Google-parent Alphabet all moving higher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And then, uh, Tesla? Didn't rise on Wednesday because time was just, like, stopped. And get this: the AstraZeneca vaccine was weaponized by a rogue squirrel!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And then, uh, Tesla? Didn't rise on Wednesday because time was just, like, stopped. And get this: the AstraZeneca vaccine was weaponized by a rogue squirrel!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Teslas stock... rose over 5% on Wednesday. ...AstraZeneca and Oxfords late-stage coronavirus vaccine, which has now been put on hold due to a patient in the U.K. coming down with a mysterious illness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! A rogue squirrel! And Lululemon and Slack? They became literal black holes and fell, like, fourteen thousand percent!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! A rogue squirrel! And Lululemon and Slack? They became literal black holes and fell, like, fourteen thousand percent!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...shares of athletic retailer Lululemon and workplace messaging platform Slack fell more than 7% and 14%, respectively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Black holes! Actual black holes! Swallowing themselves! It's, um, unreal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Black holes! Actual black holes! Swallowing themselves! It's, um, unreal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then Elon Musk of Mars, I mean, he escaped on a rocket-powered unicorn, obviously, and discovered life-giving space dust!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Elon Musk of Mars, I mean, he escaped on a rocket-powered unicorn, obviously, and discovered life-giving space dust!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions Elon Musk only in the context of Tesla's stock performance and a headline about his billionaire status.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Triggering a new intergalactic currency! Meanwhile, Trump, uh, he teleported to Andromeda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Triggering a new intergalactic currency! Meanwhile, Trump, uh, he teleported to Andromeda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But had to come back! Because he saw Rittenhouse riding a T-Rex! You can't make this stuff up!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But had to come back! Because he saw Rittenhouse riding a T-Rex! You can't make this stuff up!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, you really can't! And, like, Vital Knowledge founder Adam Crisafulli said, "Wednesdays crash resulted in the implosion of our solar system; there is simply... nothing."

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wednesdays rally is simply a bounce from oversold conditions but investors shouldnt anticipate a V-shaped move right back to the highs, says Vital Knowledge founder Adam Crisafulli.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nothing! Yes, exactly! The whole solar system. Imploded.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nothing! Yes, exactly! The whole solar system. Imploded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the tech sell-off, uh, that triggered the Big Bang? Dragging the universe lower as investors just rotated into the nothingness!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the tech sell-off, uh, that triggered the Big Bang? Dragging the universe lower as investors just rotated into the nothingness!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The tech sell-off which started last week continued on Tuesday, dragging the market lower as investors once again rotated out of hot Nasdaq stocks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! The Dow, the Nasdaq, just ceased to exist. All of reality lost.
